name: wix-webgl-components
description: Three.js WebGL Components for Wix Studio - Globe Pointer & Displacement Transition

scripts.build:displacement: cd displacement-transition && npm install && npm run build && cp public/displacement-transition.js ../public/
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && npm run build:globe && npm run build:displacement
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd displacement-transition && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install:all && npm run build
